doc.field: Records of Athletics Programs at New York University
Records of Athletics Programs at New York University

The golf team was started at New York University in 1930. The records for this team span 1930 to 1976 and contain player biographies, newspaper clippings, golf tournament programs, and NYU press releases.

Golf became a varsity sport at NYU in 1930. Just nine years later, however, the team was dissolved. When it returned in 1954, the men went undefeated with victories over city rivals Manhattan College, St. John's University, and Columbia University. In the 1980s, the team used Riverdale Country Club in New Jersey for its home matches. The team competes at the Division III level in the University Athletic Association conference.
Women's golf arrived at NYU in 2007.
Men's golf results for 2000-2014 can be found in Archives H. Women's golf results for 2007-2014 can be found in Archives H.
